title: Help : Application League of lege has been blocked from accessing Graphics hardware

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Help me please. I recently purchased an acer laptop with a Nvidia GeForce 940mx grafics card. Every time i try to play a game 5 mins into the game my screen starts to black out and freeze, come back and repeat until it finally kicks me out of the game and it gives me that message. I've updated all my drivers and stuff but it keep happening. Please help.

replies.body: Had this issue.  Upgraded to a better graphics card and I've had no issues since.  :)

You might have outdated driver or game file problems that's failing to render the game, and resulting in bugsplat errors.  No worries, go through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to tune up your new rig and get back in game!  Let me know if you have any questions!
